name: Ptoasty's Ptrials
description:
Ptoasty's New Spotlight!

Ptoasty's humble origins stem from a small appearance in Plastic Bag Simulator 2019. Now he's back, in 3D, and with his very own title!

Gameplay:

Upon the floating isle, all young Pteranadons seek to complete the trial and earn their place in the sky! Ptoasty is eager to get started. Collect all 5 crystals of the isle and earn passage to the top of the tower, completing the trial!

Why this game?

Ptoasty has been a large icon among the Weeping Weebs, small, derpy, and greatly loved. A key feature about him is that he is actually flightless.

During the time of this game's development, game designer and artist, Gigi Read, was working on two dinosaur themed games at the same time. Inspired, the Weebs decided to create another dinosaur game, featuring our beloved icon. 

In the future, Weebs Gigi and Nick Price wish to continue this them forward, and create an even larger world and refine Ptoasty's look within the 3D realm.
